Reviews.Title: Can not beat the deal
Reviews.Author: Michael Bradley
Reviews.Content: this is going to be a gift to my Son for Christmas and of course I played with it for a few hours setting it up and just playing with what it can do. this was a GREAT Buy, I am glad I got it for himALSO I LOVE AMAZON wow am I HOOKED:)

Reviews.Title: Works fantastic
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: Got here fast and so easy to use. Nice and compact and a very fast charge. So easy my 4 year old can operate

Reviews.Title: So happy
Reviews.Author: Y. S. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 10 year old brother. I love it. It is colorful, easy to use, and fast. I must admit the item is not labeled well with regard to parts, but I figured it out with a little help from the manual. I have already downloaded a few games and books are next. I know that he is going to be so happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: For the price this is perfect. I have had no problems with it whatsoever. I do recommend reading into it and making sure you are ordering what you want.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: abbiez
Reviews.Content: Its a terrific tablet---does everything that I need it to do. For the price you can't beat it. My brother wants one now.

Reviews.Title: Quality for a good price
Reviews.Author: Jerome Graham
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son who just loves it.  The price was why I bought it.  But after seeing it and using it, the thing has quality.

Reviews.Title: Totally love!
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: When I first considered buying this I was a bit skeptical, because of the low price and a couple bad reviews, but I was completely BLOWN AWAY! This device is really great! I am a college student and needed a good tablet to use for in class and this thing is perfect! I waited to post a review just to see how it would hold up. This is so worth the investment. It works just as good if not better than other tablets I used that were 3 times the price of this. Absolutely satisfied by this product!

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: KB Cagney
Reviews.Content: It's a little slow to respond. It sometimes crashes, but it was purchased for my 7 year old son, so it's fine. It's no iPad, but for kids, it's fine for the price.

Reviews.Title: The Best Tablet value
Reviews.Author: Grandma
Reviews.Content: Correct, this tablet may not do everything the more expensive ones do, but as a starter model, it's a great value for the money.  I bought this as a Christmas gift and it was a huge hit.

Reviews.Title: Suprised and Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Mezkr
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a christmas gift for my 6 yr old. He loved it, it's easy for him to navigate, holds all his pictures, and he can use google search for his homework. The system loads up quick. Overall its a good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: BOUGHT 3 FOR CHRISTMAS GIFTS! NO REGRETS!
Reviews.Author: James E.
Reviews.Content: This product has received mixed reviews and ratings so I  was kind of skeptical about what I  would be getting once this tablet arrived. first- My order arrived 3 days before its estimated arrival date. Second- I read reviews of those saying it wouldnt power up when they got it out of the box. I ORDERED 3 of these as Christmas gifts, I unboxed them and tested them all. FULL BATTERY CHARGE ON ARRIVAL! They dont seem to be too powerful from the time I spent playing with it while testing them but for the cheaper price its to be expected I got what I paid for. Over all i''m satisfied with what I got and i'm sure my boys will be just as satisfied christmas day!

Reviews.Title: Just Okay
Reviews.Author: PJCB
Reviews.Content: I received this from the company to test and review it.  So far it works fine, but time will tell.  The picture resolution is not as clear as I would prefer.  It has the ability to take pictures and video.  It is not as user friendly as an iPad, but then it costs considerably less.  You are able to get a lot for the modest price paid.  Hopefully the battery will stay charged for a reasonable amount of time.  I would consider getting a protective case as it doesn't't seem like it could hold up to too much wear and tear.

Reviews.Title: Great product will order more for all the family  fast and realiable easy to watch movies and listen to radio
Reviews.Author: Laveta R. Shelton "Renee"
Reviews.Content: Great product will order more will order more for all the family  fast and realiable easy to watch movies and listen to radio

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Jessie Rasheed
Reviews.Content: got this tablet for my granddaughter for Christmas she hasn't seen it yet but she will love it I messed around on it a little and now I want one for myself.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: William Judson Jr.
Reviews.Content: a very good item it is much better then i thought i would get,it is fast clean searching the internet at a very reasonable price i could not be happier

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for $60
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a 7inch chromo inc tablet, shipping was very fast. It took 3 days to arrive. There's only 3 things that make this tablet not like the more expensive ones: 1) The battery life 2) Viewing angle 3) How it's made.  The battery life lasts probably about 3hrs in use, there's only one viewing angle,  and it's made of plastic(get a good case and you'll be fine.)  So overall id recommend this product to anyone. For $60 you can't beat it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for a good tablet, and I have been quite impressed with this one from Chrome Inc. It features everything that could hope for. I particularly like how easy it is to connect to wi-fi. Another great feature is it ability to connect to other devices. My AccuRave ELM327 Bluetooth OBD2 Diagnostic Code Scanner - Scan Tool Check Engine Light CAR Code Reader - Android Compatible. Needless to say, I highly recommend getting this tablet; especially if you are looking for a good one.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: stefanierob
Reviews.Content: My kiddos love it. Great apps, connects to WiFi. Does the essentials  however I just wish the pixels on the camera were better. Other than that I'll buy another if I had the funds to. But I don't use the camera that much anyway. So win win.

Reviews.Title: Pissed
Reviews.Author: Neveragain
Reviews.Content: They sent an virus infected tablet that isn't worth it don't by this product������ beware of this product and ask questions before purchase

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: greg huff
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these...one for each of my daughters.They are ages 12 and 10, much too young for Ipads or expensive Android tablets.There were the absolute perfect gifts! They love them!

Reviews.Title: Android tablet
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It seemed ok until it wouldnt start up other day. Had to google what to do. Amazon great about helpi g to exchange it. Ill keep it for now unless it keeps happening. Wish it had more of a booklet with it though.

Reviews.Title: THIS WAS A REALLY GREAT ITEM...I'M STILL PLAYING WITH IT NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: lionel clark
Reviews.Content: This android tablet performed at a rate nearly comparable to my ipad...great color/fast speeds and with the apps i downloaded into it, its a workaholic tablet/pad.....I'm loving it...

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: slp
Reviews.Content: I received my table in three days....opened and it was fully charged and very ready to use....i would recommend it to others....GREAT TABLET...GREAT PRICE

Reviews.Title: Works great ...just one issue
Reviews.Author: S. Kelly
Reviews.Content: I purchase this product and was impressed, it works great, runs pretty fast, the only issue I have with it, is that the battery runs out too quick....besides that, it's a good product.

Reviews.Title: Would do business with again
Reviews.Author: Tara Taylor
Reviews.Content: Arrived very quickly. Ordered this for my daughter in order to allow her daughter to watch her abc mouse. It's in perfect shape, works amazingly. Could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: Chromo Inc 7"
Reviews.Author: jewel
Reviews.Content: I am a little disappointed that i received a front camera only when i thought i ordered a dual camera tablet.  i am happy otherwise with the product.

Reviews.Title: Was not of good quality
Reviews.Author: Justin Wisby
Reviews.Content: I would seriously recommend not purchasing this tablet. It was of poor design and quality and what ever phone you have can preform better. And thats up until the thing crashes and you notice the poor screen resolution and responsiveness. Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: loves it---he dids love it but it finally died
Reviews.Author: Mills W
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 17  y.o. son as just an extra something for Christmas and he loves it. He has a iphone and and all  but he has alot of fun with this. It froze up and I thought I would have to send back but was told by friend it would come back on in a couple of hours and it did. The trick is not to let it go dead, shut it down correctly before it goes dead and then charge it. Or it may freeze for a few hours. So that is what he has been doing and it is working fine! For the price it is a neat tablet.update-----it quit working we had to send back.

Reviews.Title: does not work
Reviews.Author: mary emerick
Reviews.Content: this was a christmas present for my grandson and he had it not even two weeks and it quit working. had to return it

Reviews.Title: This is a great Value!!
Reviews.Author: Pitty Pat "Donna T."
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my grandson who is 13 years old.  He has an ipad that the school furnishes.  I was getting this for him so he could use it when school is out and he could download things on here like music that he is not allowed to download on the  school ipad.  He says it is slow.  I played on it and are very pleased with the speed of it.  So if he doesn't use it will be mine. II think for the price it was wonderful and meet all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price for a quality tablet.
Reviews.Author: Cody LaRue
Reviews.Content: The tablet says it's white, but it is actually pearl.  It's quite light, and doesn't seem especially delicate.  I bought two of them, one for myself, and one for the boyfriend.  Both are working great, and working better than expected.  The tablet is great for its price.  Battery life isn't great, but you can't beat this deal.

Reviews.Title: Nice little piece of machine....but worst screen display
Reviews.Author: homeflash
Reviews.Content: Updates: 2013.. After 3 months using, my screen turned bad, got a line in the side. Because of that, I lowered down my stars to 3.Let me tell you how I rate them.First star - comes from the price.  Less than $80, it is a steal! Kindle and any other tablets out there cost at least $100 bucks, this one is very good in price.  If you have read my other review with other 7 inch tablet, this one sure is a winner, smooth and fast.  Other than book reader, surfing is okay, video is good as well .Second star -  google play, not getjar.  Many many apps are available. My other tablet which I return  are bad because of bad micro usb slot and getjar does not let you install certain app. This one is using google play. It is much better.Third Star - Not bad in screen resolution, and volume (although it can be better), but price like this and it is very good!Fourth star - Camera .. I didn't expect this.  It has only front view camera for video chat use (I have tried skype and it works fine with headset (oversea video chat!),without headset, it is a bit noisy .. by the way google talk and vtok will not be working).  However, you can also take picture, camcording with that.. Not super high quality, but still it is available!Fifth star - You got a power adapter, and a usb cord (mirco to regular- that can serve as charging purpose too) and a converter.  You can put your usb stick on to the usb slot and va la, you have usb drive just like pc.  Of course, if you can spare few more bucks, you can get micro usb, Nice!Of course, the memory is not super fast, but for price like that .. I already got too for my father and father in law, and decided to order one for myself as well.  Yea, I know most people got this their grand kids, I on the other hand, get this one for the old folks...

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids!
Reviews.Author: landk
Reviews.Content: Its not the "Best" tablet i've seen, but worth every penny. Cheap and works great. Just downloaded 22 games on it for my daughter for Christmas and still have  1/2 the memory. This will keep her busy! She wanted an Ipad.. She's 6... I was a little unsure when it first arrived because it came in a shipping envelope and the instructions was a thin little manual.., but after turning it on I was impressed. Better quality then I expected, but I didn't have high expectations when ordering.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this item. It is JUNK!
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this for her boys to play games on. They never got to play anything on it. The day after she received it she was trying to put a screen protector on it and the screen broke. There was no force used. When she complained about it to the company (they finally got back to her after she complained to Amazon) they claimed it must have been misused and would do nothing. So, she bought a new screen for $30. When my husband tried to replace the screen, the new screen broke as he was pressing it into place. This thing is going into the trash and we will never buy anything from this company again. Between the price for the item and the price for a new screen and no use it is a $100.00 piece of junk. I will talk her into a Kindle Fire next time.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Sherine Barnes
Reviews.Content: Great Product! Got it for my 9 year old and she did not sleep that night!! Great product features! Perfect size.

Reviews.Title: Rip off
Reviews.Author: michele
Reviews.Content: As like others, this came later than expected.  The charger does not fit at all, so it won't turn on.  I have sent three emails with no response, and no response about returning the item either.

Reviews.Title: Cracker Jack Toy
Reviews.Author: Pam S.
Reviews.Content: Arrived late. Product lasted 10 minutes. Price was listed as 199.99 marked down to 74.00.  Looked like a good deal for Christmas. Opened the box and it looked like a cracker jack toy.  I had to snap it together. The way the price was listed should be considered false advertisement. Amazon needs to make sure the money is returned. People can't afford to lose money. Tablet being returned. Do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Good for children
Reviews.Author: Frank almeida
Reviews.Content: Got as gift for my 3 year he loves it would buy for myself as a tablet. Does everything that I need

Reviews.Title: For a child
Reviews.Author: Debra P
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my toddler. He enjoys these videos on youtube called Gigglebellies. Keeps a toddler entertained when you need an hour to fold that laundry and empty/fill the dishwasher. its nice because with an affordable price like this I'm not afraid if he breaks it. It is also fair to mention that he constantly drops it and to my surprise he hasnt' been able to break it...yet.I wouldn't recommend this for an adult or even teen. I had ordered one for our 10 year old and returned it. The speed is very slow and it is limited in that it is not capability for some of the more popular apps.

Reviews.Title: The product is truly a give away and given as listed.
Reviews.Author: Blanca Estella Garcia "CONCERN PERSON"
Reviews.Content: I find this product to do everything that is listed. The important part is to read the instructions and truly understand this product. I love my pad. I just think it should have recommendations where to purchase a mini pad bag and a cover. I love this product and its a must call. Its like everything, learn how to use it and love it afterwards.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: David L. Goode
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery and works very well and because of this item and how well it works, am going to purchase another one.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: nelson mora
Reviews.Content: I have bought about 7 tablets the last two years and I consider that all of them are very very good

Reviews.Title: It is a great and convenient device at a fantastic price.
Reviews.Author: Karl Norman
Reviews.Content: I love my Android for its sleek look and is very user friendly. I was able to play movies and videos very easily.

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck.
Reviews.Author: dude
Reviews.Content: this tablet is perfect for $$ I was worried that it wouldn't perform very well but it is quite fast and it does everything that i need it to do, so i would recommend this product

Reviews.Title: I just love it
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Irvine
Reviews.Content: My whole family love it and has recommended it to some one to purchase .Love the convenience of having this device to check my mail listening to music, playing games while  away from home.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: Its a good starter tablet for a kid they love it and I loved the price it needs more memory

Reviews.Title: chromo 7 inch tablet
Reviews.Author: Mimi
Reviews.Content: First tablet I've owned so I don't have anything to compare it to.  It works for me and the memory doesn't seem to be an issue.  Shipping was fast, as usual.

Reviews.Title: Chromo Inc.® 7" -Tab PC Android
Reviews.Author: Randel L. Averett
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little tablet for the price.  I bought it for my son to take on trips with him and he is still enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Brian Farley
Reviews.Content: Not a bad tablet for $50, it is "Laggy" and at times can be slow.  Also takes several hours to charge and you get about 3-4 hours of Constant use, but what do you expect for a $50 tablet, Its a great buy and would definitely recommend it too 1st time tablet buyers or something for your kids to play on.  Great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Thought it would be a great Xmas present for my 9 year old.....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It has been only 4 months since Xmas and it won't charge at all. Horrible tablet. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying this New Tablet
Reviews.Author: kandy
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter and I am pleased with it. My only problem is that the battery dies quickly but other than that I am quite pleased.

Reviews.Title: waste of money!! do not buy
Reviews.Author: Hakm
Reviews.Content: cheap feeling to itslowthe screen was already scratched when i opened the boxbattery life is also badresolution is also badi dont know why anyone would buy it

Reviews.Title: Ok for a 7 year old!
Reviews.Author: Tarsha Henderson
Reviews.Content: Sometimes the device freezes up but for the most part its ok for a 7 year old. The price was great. I will say that before I ordered this tablet I had went through 2 of them within the month and they were horrible. So overall I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product
Reviews.Author: Leshai  James
Reviews.Content: I love my new Tablet. I just have to buy a memory card. It has gotten a little slower. I didnt realized just how much I was going to download and utilize this device. I love it.

Reviews.Title: worst purchase I've made . doesn't even turn on.

Reviews.Title: Ordered a new tablet and got a used one
Reviews.Author: BEATRIZ VARGAS
Reviews.Content: The tablet looked like it was used. It was all scratched up and the screen was very dirty. It didn't look new at all.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE

Reviews.Content: arrived on time. nice price but, will not stay connected to the internet. constantly fighting to get it to connect and lose connection shortly after. not happy with this tablet. would definetly not choose this one again if i were to purchase another.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: courtney
Reviews.Content: The tablet was already scratched before using. All around just wasn't what I expected , paid for what I got I guess

Reviews.Title: Chromo Inc. 7"
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: This is a total P.O.S. Dont waste your money as it will die in less than a months time.  I would not recommend this to anyone for any reason.

Reviews.Title: great

Reviews.Content: The tablet arrived promptly and worked great for my needs (I used it mainly for practicing characters with the app).

Reviews.Title: 7" touch pad.
Reviews.Author: HELEN MILLER
Reviews.Content: bought as a learning tool for 4yr, old granddaughter. she absolutely loves it. My daughter in law also uses it to play her games instead of using her phone.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with this product.
Reviews.Author: KathyB
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my grandchildren ages 10 & 12 for Christmas. They were excited to receive them, easy to use, connected to wifi without problems.

Reviews.Title: has its ups and done
Reviews.Author: lyd
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the delivery very fast.. It is a nice tablet but I have one problem the charger that they sent with the tablet does not fit .It takes a long time to charge.This is the second tablet and both chargers do not fit...

Reviews.Title: great for beginners or someone like me play games facebook surf around
Reviews.Author: Lisa Sampson
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first of purchasing this tablet because of the price past purchase of other cheaper tablets led me to believe it was going to be slow or I wouldn't be able to pick up WiFi unless in the same room with DSL box.. Not only do I get WiFi in every room of the house but loading pages is quick. My only complaint is battery life wish it would keep a longer charge than 2 hrs.. but for the price it is well worth it and the graphics are above average also I would recommend to my friends..

Reviews.Title: Perfect Present
Reviews.Author: Evey
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because it was the perfect present for my brother and he loves it no complaints just Fun games

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Lila Amer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is worth the money. Does just as much as a higher priced tablet. HAPPY with my purchase. Nice

Reviews.Title: Little Tablet

Reviews.Content: Bought it for a gift for daughter's boyfriend. He said he was pleased with the tablet. He downloads games to it.

Reviews.Title: good tablet
Reviews.Author: kayleigh elbourn
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet.  I got it for my 16 year old. He likes the size and simplicity of it. It is very easy to use. The charger is fragile though. You cant play on it while its charging or you take the risk of bending or braking it.

Reviews.Title: my chromo tablet
Reviews.Author: Tiffany LaFontaine
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my product , It keeps me or the kids busy and works well. Starts up right away . the only issue i do have is that if freezes up every so often. But other then that its great.

Reviews.Title: Great TAB for
Reviews.Author: Prazdncer
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my 5 year old niece and she loved it, its sturdy and has good screen quality

Reviews.Title: Re: Slow and power buttons are loose
Reviews.Author: Ebony Merritt
Reviews.Content: Not cool! I don't really like them and I now I have to go somewhere and spend more money to get the power buttons back since they are loose and broken. UGH.

Reviews.Title: VERY SLOW
Reviews.Author: Trevor Bates
Reviews.Content: Very slow and Apps quiting working very much Don't buy it. The screen is blured terrible graphics and sometimes unresponsive

Reviews.Title: Waste of money!
Reviews.Author: Madeleine kazadi
Reviews.Content: My brother hasn't been able to enjoy his Christmas present at all because it won't come on.  He tried everything, nothing works.  So it's just sitting in his room in London collecting dust.  Now I got to replace it with a better one.

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: Easy to break and chargers don't fit, worse electronic I ever purchased. It's need some upgrades cute colors is not good enough

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Armand Jones
Reviews.Content: On/off button sunk in and is now jammed and the screen cracked as soon as it was touched. Issues with the tablet as soon as it was received.

Reviews.Title: Disgruntled owner
Reviews.Author: Jaquline Perdue
Reviews.Content: The charger stopped working within a month.  Then the tablet started taking a long time to charge and now it does not charge at all.

Reviews.Title: Save Your Money

Reviews.Content: I knew going in this was not going to be the best of quality but for the price I could not pass it up for my daughter. After just one use it stoppped working and would give you error messages when you turned it on. the error message would just keep popping up. If you decide to purchase this, make sure you get the warranty so you can return it, because you probably will.

Reviews.Title: is so bad!
Reviews.Author: rachel
Reviews.Content: the tablet is working and the next hour turn off until 2 hours or the next day, I can not refund because will be so expensive for me.

Reviews.Title: cheap cheap cheap
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: The charger port fell apart like the 5th time I plugged it in now I have no way to charge it so it's now useless

Reviews.Title: This tablet is perfevt for my children. They love it!
Reviews.Author: Candice Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: All the kids got their own. Even my two year old all the way up to my thirteen year old. They are able to play games, watch Netflix, and browse internet on demand. It's awesome. The battery life is kind of short, but its a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: dont buy this piece of crap
Reviews.Author: sam mucho
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't give this a 1 star. the camera is so bad , the tablet itself freezes i hate i throw out window and got a iPad its battery runs out quickly it takes long to charge the makers made it lazy and it acts like 100 viruses are inside of it and i recommend  U GET A IPAD (WHICH I DID) OR KINDLE THEN THIS RIP OFF

Reviews.Title: Christmas gifts
Reviews.Author: Leanna
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 for my kids, ones 8 and others 3, the tablets are decently small and perfect for them. However, the ones I recieved seem to have a little problem, takes a long time to turn on and freezes. One of the chargers don't work as well. Other than that they're really nice and perfect for kids.

Reviews.Title: My first tablet..
Reviews.Author: Rosa Allison
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I've owned and so far so good here no complaints, I'm really pleased with it. It's does everything that I need it for. Netflix, email & music.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy for a younger child
Reviews.Author: Crystal Smith
Reviews.Content: I was consider about my younger child whic is 3 now but he liked it. The power button got stuck. I love Amazon dont get it twisted but the product was not all that great.

Reviews.Title: Very Poorly Made
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline D. White "NOT HAPPY"
Reviews.Content: Bought this at Christmas.  Loaded it with apps and bought SD Mico card for the music.  Within one week inside seem to fall apart.  Could not plug in charger and the power button caved inside the frame.  Dont waste your money buy a reputable brand of tablet it will last a lot longer.

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: marisa
Reviews.Content: I order this for Christmas and I actually got to checked them after I arrived from my vacation.I was very dissatisfied they are all scratch, they work ok but the screen is all scratch, I order them new,and they are all scratch from front and back. I just going to send them back .

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: carol perales
Reviews.Content: Back came off upon arrival, my grandson never got to use it,cannot be repaired,also did not come with a charger

Reviews.Title: Stay away
Reviews.Author: M. Giles "gadget nut"
Reviews.Content: It's defective! The charger can no longer be plugged into the unit after four or five times!  I'm fighting with Amazon right now to take it back!  I've been with Amazon for ten years bur this may be the end!

Reviews.Title: Got a lemon!
Reviews.Author: Fay I. McCormack
Reviews.Content: Bought as Christmas gift for granddaughters but it is totally useless. Very slow. Could not play their games. Their Mom got them a Kindle and it is amazing. Will not go cheap again!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Kristy G.
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our girls (ages 2 and 5). This was our first experience with a tablet. So far the girls have enjoyed them. Good for the price just to see how they would handle them. We are still learning some of the navigation but overall a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality resolution and expandable sd is misleading.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: The resolution of the screen images is very poor and almost hurts the eyes to look at. It is as if watching a 3d movie without the glasses. As far as flash hard drive that is expandable to sd, this is true, but what they dont tell you is that once you put the sd card in to expand the storage, it still thinks that the flash hard drive (built in sd) is the primary sd card. If you want to move apps to your external sd, you cannot unless you root the whole thing. Once you put about 10 apps on it that you cant transfer to the external sd, your memory is used up and it moves very very slow. I am not happy with my purchase, but for the price I can give it to my six year old and call it a loss. I would not recommend this to a friend to purchase.

Reviews.Title: I don't love it
Reviews.Author: Marlena
Reviews.Content: I don't like the picture on the screen but my son loves it. I would like a better camera on it

Reviews.Title: worst product ever

Reviews.Title: AWESOME gift for my 4 year old
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: I have read a lot of bad reviews for this tablet. I wanted to chime in and say I ordered one for my 4 year old and wasn't sure what I was expecting. It came in the mail safe and sound. I opened it up and installed some games, watched Netflix, and surfed the internet. It is surprisingly fast, charges fine, and battery seems to last. I use my car charger to charge it without any issues. It is great and keeps my little one happy as she can watch Netflix on the way to the sitters(I have mobile hotspot on my cell phone). This thing doesn't lag with movies or games. My little one has even dropped it once or twice and it still works fine.I like that it is supported by google play store as there is a lot of free kids games that are put out for android devices making it ideal for my little one.I know some people complain as theirs arrived broken or not able to charge but I ordered one on Black Friday(2013) and its still going strong.Let me add it has been like a Christmas present to me as well as I have my smartphone back now LOL.If anyone has any questions about it feel free to message me. I didn't get into the specs on the listing as they are already listed for you in the product description. I just wanted to say this has been a remarkable tablet for my little one. Learning games, movies, and a lot of fun.

Reviews.Title: chromo 7inch tablet
Reviews.Author: deborah l lords
Reviews.Content: very nice ordered on dec. 19th received it on 23rd. beautiful color. actually i thought a 7inch would not be big enough but its just perfect. i love it. ty

Reviews.Title: tablet not ipad
Reviews.Author: Liz91
Reviews.Content: When i saw this tablet and its price it had me wondering y. I looked into product detail and anything andoid i trust. After ordering it i realized there was reviews and i began to ponder if i made a great buy. Lots say its received broken. I got mine today and it was packaged in a envelope with bubble wrap inside. The tablet was inside its product box with original packaging and screen protecters. It looked very good to me. I took it out of the bix and it was charged. It came with two cords , charger, user manual that was very simple, and a brochure for a pic coupon. The tablet wasnt as lightweight and cheap as i read. Continuing...I've had my tablet for two weeks and it works perfect. I like how the original protective screencover is still intacked. The battery life really last 4 hours even on netflix(reason y I purchased). I love my tablet and I've realized that some reviews r intense and that maybe some devices r defective. I'm happy I got the one that I got. Good luck to everyone who purchases. I would highly recommend this tablet to family n friends.

Reviews.Content: The tablets are everything I expected they would be. Only thing is you can nor change time zone from asia/china area

Reviews.Content: I jst recieved my tablet and I love it. I dont know why everyone on here is giving this thing a bad review. I am good on computers and I set all my notifications, connected to wireless everything you do when you first get a computer. I did not have problems with the charging port and mine has not locked up. Mine also was purchased and here withing 4 days of me ordering it. matter of fact the charge is still pending in my bank account. I purchased mine from USA location. I hope this helped you make a GOOD choice. I couldnt beat the price too. good quality and great price. love it love it love it.

Maybe you can get about 30 - 40 minutes on a full charge.  Another problem is the operating system is fairly slow.  Bottom line is that the is not a Ipad by any stretch of the imagination!

Reviews.Title: meh...
Reviews.Author: Jaydon
Reviews.Content: First let me say, this tablet took FOREVER to ship. It took about 2 weeks. But the actual tablet, is OKAY. its good if you don't have an android and you want one. But it does have its many flaws.PROS:*lightweight*long ENOUGH battery life*Nice touch screenCONS:*slow*slow booting*SUPER glare*bad internet connection.*turns off randomlyHard to turn on, I have to press and hold multiple times.So this tablet is exceptional but it didn't meet my expectations. I've had a wp7 smartphone but never android HOWEVER I have lots of experience with android and I recommend spending more money on the higher end tablets and if you have to, just save some money. I don't recommend this tablet but if you decide to get it, you won't be completely disappointed. 3 stars....

Reviews.Title: Chromo Inc® White 4gb 7" Android 4.0 Touch Capacitive Screen 1.5ghz...
Reviews.Author: Joe Guerra
Reviews.Content: The tablet never booted up even after charging several times. The connection for charging was very flimsy and would not hold the tip of the charger tightly for a good connection.Customer service handled the return promptly. A Postage paid return label was provided promptly.Just waiting on the refund to be credited to my credit card. Notification of refund was received.

Reviews.Title: chromo inc
Reviews.Author: rj
Reviews.Content: this tablet had got decent reviews for what is was when i opened it it turned on with no problem loaded up quickly and used it for about a day then the next day it would not take a charge and finally would not power up at all at this time i will not say anything else about this item because i never was able to use it

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: I ordered two items from this seller and both came a week later than Amazon's email notification. The tablet is slow but the resolution is ok. The instruction manual is all but unusable. It has been copied so many times that the pictures are unreadable. The instructions were written by someone for whom English is a second language, so some of the procedures are incomprehsible. The company does have a one page website - no tech support and no way to download a digital version of the manual. I will not ever buy from this company again. Amazon only takes back dead on arrival tablets, so I'm stuck with it.Update: The screen does not always respond to touch - it is quite frustrating to hit a button or try to close a tab and nothing works, not your finger or the stylus that I bought. Also, I thought that I could at least use it to stream tv or movies - wrong! It either does not play them at all, is too slow to load them into cache, or there is a missing app. After 45 minutes of frustration I was informed that it was shutting down because the battery was low. It was a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Great for a starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Justin T. Eilar "JTwig"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 10-year old as a Christmas present. So far it has worked great, though it does rarely freeze up (just turn it off and back on to unfreeze). My son loves it, and my wife is even thinking of getting one so we won't have to share our Kindle Fire. My only complaint is that the battery at full charge only last about 2-hours, which is not a problem while we are at home but when traveling it might be a hassel.It does seem to boot-up slightly slower than my Kindle Fire and the screen image quality is not quite as good, but its download and streaming speeds appear to be the same. It cannot use the Amazon app store, but the Android App Store has a lot of games that cost money on Amazon for free (Angry Birds Star Wars for one). Also unlike my Kindle Fire it does not require a credit card to activate the tablet or the Android App account, which means I don't have to worry about my 10-year old accidently purchasing a bunch of apps. If he wants something that cost money I have found I can usually purchase it at the Amazon App Store, and have it download directly to his tablet.Overall we are very happy with our purchase, and may even get more for our other children.UPDATE 05/02/13: The tablet is still working, thought it is starting to experience "glitches" such as freezing and scrambled screen images. My son has found that they both are fixed by turning off the tablet and restarting it. My biggest concern though is the battery is holding less and less of a charge. When we first purchased it our son would get 2 hours (give or take) on a full charge, now he is getting between 45-60 minutes of tablet time on a full charge. I would still rate this as an excellent starter tablet for a child, but I've had to reduce my ranking from 4 stars to 3 stars. My son still loves it.

Reviews.Title: Was not worth the money
Reviews.Author: melinda j beard
Reviews.Content: Maybe ok for some but very disapointed in the quility and performance was out of the box 15 mins a found it to be broken went threw the proper channels for repair or replace and still nothing would not recomend this product to no one its just a waste of money

Reviews.Content: I know, I know, what do you expect from a $50.00 Tablet. Well, read till the end.I bought this Tablet for my Wife, we want to start in the world of Tablets and where reading a lot of good reviews for this one.Unpacking was easy, turning on was easy. Then the trouble began. The Tablet was slow. How Slow? You could cook an Egg until the Tablet reacts. No , Seriously. Ad is saying Multi Touch Screen.If Multi Touch means that you have to touch multiple times till it works, well, then this is for you. Everybody that expects a little for his money, please stay away from it.

Reviews.Title: wonderful tablet

Reviews.Content: The tablet was wonderful I love it we ordered a total of 3 but one was defective but that's ok because amazon is going to give us a full refund and then we will reorder another one this entire experience has been really great we love our tablets they are fast and cool thank you.

Reviews.Title: chromo inc tablet

Sorry Sir this item you bought is GARBAGE".... VERY UNHAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE.

Reviews.Title: $75 Paper Weight
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This product is horrible, seller is even worse. They know they are selling garbage. I paid $75 for a paper weight. There is no brand name for this tablet. In the "instruction manual" there is no web site or phone number to contact or even know who makes this garbage! Strongly advise all to stay away! Not worth it! My advise would be to spend a little more money for something better, I love my Kindle, basically does all the same things, minus the camera, and I have one of the first Kindle Fire's made. Just PLEASE don't waste your hard earned money on this product, PLEASE!! It will save you all the problems I had to go through, which was a months worth of time, just trying to fix it, and the $74.99 I had worked hard for! I cannot believe they are still selling these! And now they are saying it is a "New Model for 2013". It's the same paper weight that I got screwed over with! This seller keeps LOWERING the price because they know it's garbage. Beware of this "tablet" and DO NOT BUY IT! YOU WILL BE WASTING YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY!

Reviews.Title: Works great for our purposes
Reviews.Author: Queen Bee "BLA"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday.  I just wanted some educational games for him and this works fine for that purpose.  So far that's all we've used it for, but no problems.  The battery charge doesn't last all that long (I'm not sure how long, but only a few hours it seems), but overall it's fine for what I bought it for.  It has once-in-a-while gone to a black screen (shut off) in the middle of something, but if you hit the power button it goes right back to where it was with seemingly no inteference, so it's not a big deal.I have no other "tablet" experience (I own a Kindle fire which I much prefer to this) but overall I'm satisfied with this for our purposes (educational apps for a 1st grader).

Reviews.Title: Okay but not great
Reviews.Author: Mtimmerman
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my daughter and it is alright for a few games but the battery life is not good at all when you play certain games. She has to charge it like every hour or two at the most. I recommend this if you want a tablet to play with at home but not to travel with.

Reviews.Content: Missing charger on one, 2 out the three wont stay on at all. Battery life is very poor. I contacted seller with no response back. Very unsatisfied customer. I dont know if this was because of the cold shipping weather or what happened. But its trash and i could cry.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dinah C. Washington
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 6 year old for Christmas. I own a Kindle Fire and I was hoping this tablet would keep her satisfied enough so that we are not always fighting over my Kindle. Well, I was wrong. She is a youtube junkie and it stalls on most videos and many others it won't play, even with Flash Player installed. The battery literally lasts about an hour and a half. She has just learned to use it plugged in most of the time. The picture quality /resolution is terrible. She can play games on it pretty well but web surfing and videos run slow in comparison to the Kindle Fire that is supported by the same in-house WiFi ...that's how I'm assured its the device. Long story short, she still reaches for my Kindle Fire and I wish I had of just bit the bullet and got her one if her own.Oh well, you get what you pay for.:(

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE DO NOT BUY

Reviews.Content: i had this thing for a day they lied to me to begin with said it was shipped the 11th come to find out it wasnt shipped to the 27th warning do not buy from these guys i ordered this as a gift it was late  and i even chased down a mailman on foot christmas eve to see if it came and it didnt i will never buy from these guys again i had this only for one day and its stuck at the android loading screen for 2 hours already this is complete junk beware before you buy !!!!! ABSOLUTE RIP OFFS

The tablet won't charge or come on. Very disappointed with this product in general. I am now gonna have to go get a new tablet for my girls

Reviews.Title: My tablet i purchased
Reviews.Author: Stefan
Reviews.Content: I order the tablet for my daughter and I just had to send it back to amazon. The charging port and the usb port, completly caved into the tablet, and she no longer could charge her tablet. It seem liked it was very poorly put together. So now I am waiting on my refund from amazon, I had to send it back.

Reviews.Title: Chromo 7" Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Clearly, this is not an iPad. It is a VERY inexpensive 7" tablet. That being said, it works great. I am actually using it for a movie player in my car for my son. DVD's get scratched, skip, etc. No more of that. When I received the tablet, I opened the box and was pleased to find the tablet, a 5v wall charger (it has a charging port and can charge through the micro USB port), a USB cable, and a USB adapter (I guess for the people that want to use a USB keyboard?).After charging the tablet, I turned it on and everything worked fine. The screen is not the highest quality and the viewing angles are not great, but the touchscreen is responsive, navigation through apps is snappy, and it plays back movies just fine. Netflix even streams well with my phone as a hotspot.I would not recommend this for an adult, but if you have a toddler with sticky hands and do not want to hand them a $400 piece of electronics equipment, this thing really is great.

Reviews.Title: Seems like we are all in the same boat :/ FILE COMPLAINT
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: After reading half of these reviews, I was thankful to see that I was not the only one going through this with SELLER1ON1. The tablet is junk, won't charge, charger port doesn't even fit(safety hazard for electic shock), and the seller only responds when you threaten to contact Amazon, but I have waited much longer than I should have in the first place for this issue to be resolved and I am contacting AMAZON first thing tomorrow. Worst buying experience ever, and as alot of others I see also, it was supposed to had been a Christmas gift to my child, guaranteed by Dec 24th, but didnt come until Dec 29th. *** I am absolutely done dealing with them and waiting and wasting my time. I am filing a complaint with Amazon and I hope that you consider doing the same as well as all of these others in the same situations so that together we can put these RIP OFF SELLERS in their place! ********

Reviews.Title: It sucks
Reviews.Author: Rose Gov
Reviews.Content: This was ordered for my 12 year old daughter with her money that she was given as a reward for singing.  It looks good for her but it does NOT charge!  It turns on when it is plugged up but even when it is left overnight to charge, the battery meter still says 0%.  When plugged out from the electrical charger, it immediately shuts off.  The usb port does not charge it either.It is just a total waste of money and I think the seller knows that they need to be recalled, yet the company still sells them.  I am so upset, because we did not order any mini touchscreen desktop pc, this is how the tablet is operating...  I am so sorry that I had ordered it before all the other negative results were written.  I would have never ordered it.I definitely would encourage potential shoppers to steer clear of this tablet unless you want one that can only work like a desktop pc..

Tried hooking up the usb charger and still won't charge. I want a refund and a new tablet.

Reviews.Title: Volume to way to slow

My problems are: I always restart the tab many times after my 2yr old daughter watch few times her favorite show at youtube like barney and etc. Most of the time it disconnected to our cable internet. Camera is super blurred seems you can not recognized your own face in the camera roll. It would be okay if they improved the quality of resolutions, there are many other brand same as the price of this item which i can say has a clear camera resolution and internet connection is not a problem. I gave 3 star because it is functional but you have to have a lot of patience. Since my 2yr old is still a baby I guess she could used this for a while. Many times she complains a lot to me and I feel ashame. May be next time I will save more to buy bit expensive one:) thanks anyway:) Good luck to all manufacturer who will improve this more:)

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD

Reviews.Content: IT WORKS WELL, LOVE IT, BUT THOUGHT I WAS GETTING DUAL CAMERA. VERY EFFICENT AND PUNCTUAL. THANK YOU FOR YOUR RESPONSE.

Reviews.Title: Very poorly constructed product.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend. It has a cheap look to it, which when i first saw it i told myself well it is cheap so you get what you buy as long as it works well. It worked well for 2 months after that the screen started to flicker, then it stopped holding charge. It reached the point that i could have only used it while hooked up to the charger. There is no way to change the battery, until only day it came apart, apparently the battery (at least i think it was the battery - a silver rectangular object inside it) Swelled up so big! i was shocked. I quickly threw the entire thing for fear that whater was inside would explode or leak out.Worst product ever. Do not buy it is not worth it! pay the extra $3 bucks and try another brand.

One is barely holding its charge currently and the other experienced battery explosion. I got these as gifts for my nephew and niece and I am concerned of the safety of having kids playing with this happening as a possibility. I have not contacted the vendor as yet besides getting a refund or replacement I think the safety of kids are more important so I needed to have this known as a possibility. There is one thing for the battery to explode and just damage the internal device but for it to literally explode and leak out.... Not happy about that.

Reviews.Title: Not terrible for its price, I guess
Reviews.Author: Howard Thompson
Reviews.Content: I got this for ~$50 and I wouldn't pay a cent more for it. For that price, it's a pretty good deal for a casual tablet user. I basically just use it around the house, to save me the hassle of bringing my other computer everywhere I go around my apartment. But if you want an actually decent tablet, I'd go elsewhere and shell out a bit more money.This one is slow and freezes frequently, even when running just one app. Typically that happens on startup, and once the app gets going, everything seems to work ok. I used it for Hulu and it worked pretty well for me. Battery life is relatively short too. Not a ton of space is available on it either. More than enough to download your typical load of apps, but not much more. The speaker on the device isn't great either. Volume level is suitable for most things, but when I watched Hulu, I had to use headphones.I got this because because my roommate got a (better) tablet that seemed pretty convenient. This one is a little convenient, but I find myself using my laptop more and more.

Reviews.Title: it was to good to be true

Apparently, the Android certification process doesn't approve of any websites except what's listed on the menu.  It constantly gives you messages that tells you it's not a certified site.  Places I'd been to hundreds of times.  It definitely was not worth the money I spent on it.  A bargain is not a bargain if it sits and collects dust from non use.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: marie
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my stepson for his 8th birthday. Not the most high tech tablet out there but kids don't need anything that fancy. His dad initially wanted to get him a Nabi but we have a new baby on the way and I could not justify spending that much on something with such bad reviews that he wouldn't be able to use for school when he gets older. I downloaded the Kid's Place app and it lets us choose which other apps he's allowed to open and set time limits, it also doesn't let him exit to the regular home screen to mess with settings or other apps without our password. I love it. His dad is glad I talked him into the cheaper "adult" tablet because he can use it too when his son is at school :) It is a little slow sometimes, but I think that's because our wifi has been acting up lately and not because of the tablet itself. Battery life drains a lot faster when he watches videos the whole time but I think that's pretty normal. Can't go wrong for under $60 with free shipping!

Reviews.Title: Very inexpensive tablet for Android development
Reviews.Author: shanzen
Reviews.Content: This tablet was purchased for testing an Android app. It served that purpose very well, especially for the price.  To get 'adb' to recognize the tablet, add the USB vendor ID and product ID into C:\Users\[user name]\.andriod\adb_usb.ini like below:  # ANDROID 3RD PARTY USB VENDOR ID LIST -- DO NOT EDIT.  # USE 'android update adb' TO GENERATE.  # 1 USB VENDOR ID PER LINE.0x2207; 0x0010For normal use, I would rather pay a bit more to get one with dual cores and sharper screen.

First, i did not receive two chargers, it is ungodly slow (im talking have been waiting for my facebook page to load for the last 7 min). I tried using the preinstalled Netflix app and i always get the same "Netflix is unavailable" message. I downloaded a few other apps that have worked when they want to it seems. I realize it was fairly cheap and i am not expecting it to run as an Ipad or Kindle, i just want it to run in general. Not at all happy.

I also did not appreciate the camera, since I don't need one on an e-reader. The instruction book was the biggest joke, however. It was in print so small I had to use a magnifying glass to read it at all.It has been returned.

Reviews.Title: Poor Customer Service
Reviews.Author: kristytilson
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet on March 7th and the "tracking" number that is given does not work on USPS system. I am extremely upset because I order from Amazon ALL THE TIME and I never have had a problem like this. When I pay $60 for something I expect to be able to track it so I know exactly where it is and exactly when I am going to be receiving it. I work all day and need to make arrangements to have someone home to get the package. This is extremely poor customer service and I would like a refund if I cannot get an accurate tracking number. Today is the 18th and I still have no idea where this is. I will NEVER buy from this seller again. BUYER BEWARE!!

Reviews.Title: Loved it

We started charging it with the USB cord through the computer and now even that won't work. The tablet will not turn on at all. USELESS!!! SAVE YOUR MONEY!

Reviews.Title: great for kids

Reviews.Content: Perfect For My Three Year old, Sterdy Perfect Size For His Small Hands To Handle, He Loves It Very much

Reviews.Title: Excellent gift

Reviews.Title: Easy to work!!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not exactly what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: This tablet looked good in the pictures but after a day of using it I just want to throw it at the wall. I had an ipad 1 and got rid of it so missing it I thought I'd grab one of these and I didnt enjoy it. small for me, slow out of the box, screen quality lacking, color lacking, low volume, holds charge for 2 hours on 12 hour charge. Returning it.

Reviews.Title: Nice layout but has MANY issues
Reviews.Author: Jason J. Blood
Reviews.Content: I bought my daughter an RCA tablet for Christmas. A month later I pick her up from her moms house and ask her why she does not have her tablet. She tells me that her knee locked up going upstairs, she dropped it and the screen cracked. I  know it was an accident and I feel bad so I want to replace it but I am on a budget. I ordered this as a cheap replacement. I gave it to her on a Friday at 5pm when I picked her up and she said it was great. She loved the layout because it was more like her cell phone than the RCA was. By 3pm the next day she came to me and said "Dad I didnt drop it but its broken. Its not working right." I had already read about this and knew the solution. I told her to hold down the power button for 15 or 20 seconds to reboot it. An hour later I asked her how it was working. She said that it was working the same as when she took it out of the box. Its nice that it is easy to use but needing a reboot after less than 24 hours concerns me about the future of this tablets performance.UPDATE: My daughter is only here 2 weekends a month. After just 3 weekends the charging plug inside the unit no longer works. We had to plug my cell phone charger into the micro-usb slot instead. The screen is made of plastic instead of glass so wiping it with a paper towel and glass cleaner scratched the screen horribly. I will NEVER buy this brand again! They should have called it Crappo instead of Chromo!

Reviews.Title: great product and great price
Reviews.Author: Andrew Ingold
Reviews.Content: great buy for the money, my daughter could not be more happy with this product, I give it five stars

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift for my 6 year old son

Reviews.Title: Great

I guess it's to much to ask that companies give at least 60 or 90 days on their product.

Reviews.Title: works better than expected
Reviews.Author: Laciejay
Reviews.Content: I didn't have a large budget to buy a tablet for a friend. I was very weary about buying a brand or model that I had never heard of but I am glad I took that chance. This tablet while it isn't extremely fast, works great. They have it set up so they can use it as a remote for their iTunes which is cool. They really like it. It plays videos and music online without a problem. They have it hooked up to our wifi so it doesn't cost them anything in data. It is in a cheap plastic case, but I bought the warranty with it so I don't mind. Don't expect to buy this and do tons of work or multi tasking on it, it just isn't fast enough for that. But if you just want something to read with or watch videos or play games on, this is a great product for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Good for really young kids, not for kids 8 and up.
Reviews.Author: VWP.
Reviews.Content: The tablet is okay for kid's ages 2-5. However not for kids 6 and up. I purchased 3 for my kids, initially they were excited but once they started uploading popular apps; that's where disappointment came in. First issue they had was all related to the apps performance within the tablet. Some apps won't even play, and other apps weren't even offered in the Google app store because of the tablet compatability.  Another problem with this tablet is that it came with so much pre-loaded apps and junk that's really hard to remove.  I added a 16gb sd card and it really didn't make much difference,  the tablet is still very slow and the system won't allow you to delete or move over certain apps to sd card.Like I said before, this is a great tablet for very young kiddos not older kids. Specially kids Like mine that had a taste of excellence with my ipad. Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money you better off going to walmart and buying one of their cheap tablets it would be better

Reviews.Content: First off when I first bought this piece of garbage I said it was 1.2 dual-core processor when I got the tablet i ran a few test suck as a cpu identifier which I will tell you how many cores any Item my phone is a quad core and it tell me my device has a quad-core processor so I ran the test on this it turned out to be a single core and less then 1 ghz it was a 800 mhz which it very slow then I contacted the seller and some kept acting like I was dumb one basically as in didn't know what I was talking about tell the there it two chip a cpu and gpu the cpu os the processor and the gpu is the graphics chip ever thing has both things or it wouldn't run correctly but I kept fight some who love to false advertise so I end up keeping the piece of garbage extremely  unsatisfied with it

Reviews.Title: nice

Reviews.Title: Concern Turned to Satisfaction
Reviews.Author: S. Kinbar
Reviews.Content: We bought these tablets for the kids for Christmas. They are so much less expensive than the iPad Mini and claim to have similar functionality. When the kids first started using them they were really slow and it was clunky to set up the Internet connection and purchase downloads.I read another review that said inserting a 16 gig memory card would speed up the device. I bought two 32 gig cards for the older kids and two 16 gig cards for the younger kids, and that totally solved the speed problem. And now that we've set up payments for downloads and the Internet is connected, that part's not an issue anymore. The kids are really happy playing Minecraft on these things and my son says he is just as happy with this as the iPad Mini he has also used.The one thing I notice that is still a problem from time to time is that they don't pick up a strong Internet signal if they are on the other side of the house form the wireless router. If they are in the same room or next room, no problem. One other thing to be careful about is that the chargers are poorly made and one broke off inside a tablet the first week. We were able to get it out but the chargers should be a little sturdier.

Reviews.Title: Useful second tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: So I have a Nexus 7 which my 5 year old uses almost exclusively and we love it.  I wanted to get a tablet for my 2 year old since she has started to try and interfere with my 5 year olds.  I felt there was enough apps available that she'd like and I run with Zoodles to block internet connections.This tablet was the right price AND it supported Google Play (which most kid tablets do NOT).  Having played around with it for a week and then my daughter unwrapping it on Christmas I can say it is ok.....Strengths* Google Play support.  Meaning all your apps on your phone or other devices can be put on this.  Also supports Zoodles, but there are some bugs (like can not manage time allowance - it crashes zoodles)* Price - for the listed price you get a tablet (albeit a cheap one)* Amazon + Protection Plans are cheap.  I recommend getting one for a tablet (esp. with Kids).  The Nexus made it a year - with a 4.5 year old.... this one will only be used under supervision.Cons* The screen is weak (not very bright and resolution is poor compared to the nexus)* It is slow - you get what you pay for but if you are running more than one app .... be prepared to wait while the other app is swapped into memory.* Battery is not great.  My daughter makes about 1.5 hours watching videos/cartoons/fisher-price flash cards etc.  The nexus can play games for 6 hours!
