Reviews.Title: Cute cheap simple wifi tablet with no store
Reviews.Author: Donald Jason Tolman
Reviews.Content: One reason this is obviously such a low price is that it is NOT supported by Google play,however because of android you can download the Amazon App store right from the browser, and 3rd party stores. Its a shame because the Google store is built into the infrastructure of the device.USB port is not physically supported so be careful a small tap and break it, and the power cord is frighteningly long and thin.If you plan on changing the OS be noted with two separate devices being tested, i could not get the device to boot up into recovery mode. ( AKA power and volume up ∨ Down )All that said, its exactly what i wanted a cheap simple tablet with only wifi, a device i can be rough with and not worry about how much i spent on it.

Reviews.Title: Omg worst biught item
Reviews.Author: yocelyn
Reviews.Content: Bught 2 one was working fine now that i returned the one the other one is not working worst part they were gift embarasing.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the effort!
Reviews.Author: Katrice Livingston
Reviews.Content: I have tried loading approximately 15 Apps, I only came through! Very frustrating! Sending this item back today!!!! The App I did download doesn't even work.

Reviews.Title: kids use
Reviews.Author: laird
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for a kid when starting out in the electronics, it was affordable easy for my child to use and she was 9 at the time. The one thing that's important not to forget is to load the app killer so it wont freeze up, the processer is not at all fast but perfect for her games and better than facebook games if not even better, she loves to read on it and travel with it. It holds a great charge even when not in use.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Gerardo R.
Reviews.Content: it may be a little slow but over all its a great product :) and plus i'm pretty sure its faster than the other tablets and is priced well

Reviews.Title: Simple But Efficient
Reviews.Author: Tim "Timdiana" Dunn
Reviews.Content: I'm actually like this tablet. It may not be the most glamorous, but it does get the job done. Plus when using the likes of New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!, the tablet is terrific. So I recommend getting this if you are looking for simple but solid tablet.

Reviews.Title: !!!!!DONT BUY IT!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: ThePowerWithinX
Reviews.Content: ITS REALLY BAD!!!! Right when i turned it on the screen was all fuzzy and white and I could not see the image the plastic is poor and It comes with a screen protector you cant take off with tons of bubbles! Please save your money and buy and i-pad!!! But I got my money right back becaause amazon is awesome.

Reviews.Title: It is a waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Joshua Mooring
Reviews.Content: This product is slow, unreliable, and has a lot of defects. Every time I wanted to download something on this tablet, I would have to delete my account then reinstall it. It would never connect to the internet and would lag almost all the time. I would not recommend this to anyone one. "You get what you pay for."

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in the time promised. I had some difficulty setting it up and had to reset it several times to get it to work but now it is working fine. My daughter can access her facebook and yahoo accounts and that was what was most important to her. She can also download apps from the google play store. The on/off button is a little flaky and you have to push it several times to get it to work. I could probably return/exchange it but we will see if it becomes a major problem. It only has a forward facing camera. I still think that it is a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: nikki
Reviews.Content: Loved this purchase it made a really great gift so i couldnt be happier with this great screen size too

Reviews.Title: Chromo Inc tablet
Reviews.Author: Jeannine Godfrey
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for the price.  The only problem I have is with lack of support.  I'm having a problem using Google Play store (which I think is a problem with the Android operating system) so can only download from Google Play intermittently.  Maybe Google support can help but I suspect the answer is to wait for the next software update for Android.

Reviews.Title: This was a birthday for my daughter.
Reviews.Author: Angeline Hudson
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her tablet. She says she likes using it as opposed to the desktop and the laptop. She also loves the small size for mobility.

Reviews.Title: Android Tablet with damaged display
Reviews.Author: David Losada
Reviews.Content: The tablet works correctly, but came with a blue stripe in the middle of the screen, and that's because the display is damaged and it is assumed that should not come as well, since they are details that determine the quality of the product to be purchased.Please request your valuable help with the change of the tablet due to inconvenience as described.

Reviews.Title: P.O.S
Reviews.Author: Breathless "Dir En Grey Lover"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely hate this tablet. 4 months after I got this as a birthday present, it completely stopped working! First,it factory reset on me, 4 times! Each for apparently no reason. This reset my games each time, destroying progress I had had with each game. Than the charger port broke. Luckily I had the usb charger of an old phone of mine. Than the tablet no longer connected to MY wifi. Not someone else's signal, but one I PAY a monthly fee for. I would slide the wifi on and 5 seconds later it would turn off on it's own. Than the usb port I used to charge it with broke. THAN it began re-starting, every 5 seconds! Restart,try again, restart. All on it's own! This is a crappy product which must be destroyed, and pulled off the market.

Reviews.Title: Stopped charging up after 4 months
Reviews.Author: Laura Keresztes-welden "Lwelden"
Reviews.Content: My 9 y.o. son loved playing this and it worked well with Google play. Unfortunately it stopped charging. After 1 month the wall plug in stopped working. We charged up using the USB until that gave out. :( I contacted the seller and they said to contact the manufacturer. We'll see what happens. I've has a nook for 2 years and it's still going strong. If it was still charging up and working I would give it 4 stars because my son spent so much time on it. We were able to download movies from Google and the quality was good. Another issue was that it did a factory reset twice. At first I blamed my son for messing with the settings but then I saw the reviews on here and others were having issues with that too.

Reviews.Title: Not recommended.
Reviews.Author: elaine ogren
Reviews.Content: Did not impress me at all. Difficult to use. Screen was not as sensitive as expected.I returned it. would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: This is a crap tablet
Reviews.Author: Johannes Paulus
Reviews.Content: This is a crap tablet do not buy it, first of all it is sooooooo slow takes ages to open a page, it does not run all the android apps. Battery only last like 10 seconds. I will recomend not to buy this.

Reviews.Title: bad charging system
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: the charging systom sucks after two weeks it will not charge i bought two of these and both of them done the same thing i would noy recomend it to any one.

Reviews.Title: This is wonderful to read I see so many things that are listed operating in  this season. A great study guide for groups, I had
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Belardo
Reviews.Content: It works fairly good however almost return it cause the power cord had a malfunction replace it no more problems.

Reviews.Title: WOULD NOT EVEN GIVE 1 STAR
Reviews.Author: Foopoo123
Reviews.Content: Bottom line, it broke within a week. no joke. you take the back off and its put together with ducktape and plastic. seriously BY FAR the worst tablet I have EVER seen and/or used.

Reviews.Title: Eh...
Reviews.Author: echoes1661
Reviews.Content: It did alright but the thing started slowing down while performing certain functions.  Just a reminder to anyone who does buy this tablet: it works great with you miniSD card but IT WILL BY ALL MEAN SLOW YOUR TABLET DOWN....GARAUNTEED!!

Reviews.Title: Started off great
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Hennet
Reviews.Content: Started off great, now won't come on to do much. At first I was very pleased as this was a great deal for the kids. But now we can't play any games or much else on it.

Reviews.Title: Piece Of Junk
Reviews.Author: Robert Wilson
Reviews.Content: Do NOT buy this wannabe tablet will not turn on half the time, does not run any apps and battery feels like its going to melt the case very slow. cheap unfinished feel my sons legos look better.not a good tablet if they were giving it away .

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, one each for my wife and I. The first one (mine) had one of those tabs for the clear plastic that covers the screen when you first buy a tablet. I went to pull it off and it turns out the protective screen was UNDER the touch screen (?). Now my touch screen is cracked because someone put the tablet together wrong.  The other tablet constantly freezes during use. Horrible product.I'm not even sure the company that makes these is legit. The box the tablet came in didn't even have the company's name on it, there's no serial number or barcode on the box, no contact information, etc. I went to their website and all it says is that they're based in New York. There is no contact information on their website either.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Preastman08
Reviews.Content: This thing doesn't work right. Do not buy this. The only thing that works is Internet. Apps will not download right at all. Piece of junk

Reviews.Title: Merchandise Damaged
Reviews.Author: Cecelia M Harris
Reviews.Content: I didn't get a chance to use it, it was damaged, screen cracked and the inside was bubbled like it had gotten wet

Reviews.Title: Won't work
Reviews.Author: Kristy
Reviews.Content: I could not get it to download any apps it would however connect to Internet but would not download anything so I set it to factory settings an now it will not do nothing I am about to send it back but we have bought others for my kid an mom an I like them so I want another one

Reviews.Title: Worthless out of the box and waste of money.
Reviews.Author: Frank Gilley
Reviews.Content: Like I said worthless out of the box. Screen kept messing up flickering, would not rotate and other issues. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Michelle M "Michelle"
Reviews.Content: Revised 11.23.2013- This product at only 6 months of having it, will not restart and can not be reset or used any longer. Based on the return/exchange policy of AMAZON, I had to do so by May 9th, 1 month after. Isn't there a warranty for 1 year on products like these? I would suggest checking before ordering it.This was bought for my 2 and a half year old from my mother. It is an ok tablet. It is slow and freezes alot. But for her, it is fine. I would not recommend it for someone who really wants to use it for much more than entertaining a child though.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Gustavo A. Olarte Muñoz
Reviews.Content: but did not fulfill my expectationsthe battery has a very short durationbesides the charger itself is not very good quality

Reviews.Title: okay if you are not using it for everything.
Reviews.Author: angeandre4
Reviews.Content: Got this about a month ago. No instructions. Not 4G. Was going to send it back. At first it would not turn on. Battery would not stay charge for long because you have to completely shut it off to conserve battery. USB takes forever to charge and have to hold power button for a while before it comes on. It freezes at times but since its my first one and I did not pay too much it will do for now.

Reviews.Title: irritated
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Poor quality, worked for one day then froze up. Once able to get out back on everything was in another language and we lost everything that we downloaded. Then froze up again completely. We were able to return with full refund. Don't purchase this item!

Reviews.Title: Chromo White 4GB 7" Android 4.0 Touch Screen
Reviews.Author: Cliff Benedict
Reviews.Content: I got it for my 12 year old Grandaughter and it did not last too long.  I blame her more than the tablet.  Constant use and no charging until battery dead.

Reviews.Title: charging issues
Reviews.Author: Scott Evans
Reviews.Content: I bought the item for a Christmas gift and had to return it shortly after due to it not wanting to charge. The second one also has allot of charging problems and the usb port broke and fell out shortly after arriving.  Not an item I will buy again.

Reviews.Title: totally dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Dory Mayer
Reviews.Content: this product is totally faulty........none of the plugs work on the tablet.....I am unable to plug any of the accessories into the tablet to charge it......and I have asked for a refund from BusinessWorld and am still waiting to hear back from them on returning the item

Reviews.Title: CHROMO INC WHITE 4GB 7" ANDROID 4.0 Touch Capacitive Screen 1.2gh 512 RAM
Reviews.Author: Cecelia E. Odum
Reviews.Content: SellOne was on top of my concerns and provided the reimbursement of the tablet.  The other tablets seems to be working well after trouble shooting.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Luis C.
Reviews.Content: It is ok for the use. I should've spent a bit more for one that can do more, a bit slow.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Luis C.
Reviews.Content: It is ok for the use. I should've spent a bit more for one that can do more, a bit slow.

Reviews.Title: The touch screen is difficult to use.
Reviews.Author: Thomas W. Moulton
Reviews.Content: The screen is not very reactive in one instance and yet at the same time the area I wasn't trying to enable will take off.The stylus is useless and my fingers are too big for some screens. All in all it is not a good investment.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lynn Bradley "ladydoced"
Reviews.Content: Just wish it had more memory but then again I would have a lpaptop if that were the case.  Would like to see it have the capability to use Microsoft Office.

Reviews.Title: Poor Product
Reviews.Author: Autumn Sims
Reviews.Content: First off it took a full 24 hours to fully charge and then withing 20 minutes the battery was half way empty. Secondly it constantly freezes during start up. I was hoping for a small tablet to use on the go but this tablet is completely unusable.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: theresa1
Reviews.Content: We got the tablet for our 10 year old...it worked for one week...now the touchscreen doesn't work at all. I'm trying to replace it through amazon but not getting a response.

Reviews.Title: Chromo
Reviews.Author: Britt
Reviews.Content: It work the first week it worked well but after that the brightness was not staying on and other things just stop working

Reviews.Title: this tablet is a piece of junk
Reviews.Author: madatcompany
Reviews.Content: This tablet barely lets me download an app!!!!!! Sometimes it won't even let get into the play store!!!! I would rate this thing no stars but that's not an option!!!! Don't waste your money on this trash!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Android OS Failed
Reviews.Author: Marlon Santiago Delgado
Reviews.Content: When i turn the tablet dont run android. I need a firmware for this product. HELP PLEASE!!! marlonsantiago7@hotmail.comQuien sabe el firmware de este producto. No funciona el Android

Reviews.Title: OK Tablet...But clearly false advertising...
Reviews.Author: Codie
Reviews.Content: The processor barely clock 1Ghz there is definitely NOT 4GB of Internal storage...nor is there but about 512MB of RAM when it says 1GB. So...it's an ok tablet, screen quality is terrible but hey, it's cheap and from china...it'll get the job done if you're super frugal. UPDATE: The tablet was broken and non-functional within 3 and-a-half months.

Reviews.Title: It does not charged with the charger and does not work.
Reviews.Author: Pamela J Hanley
Reviews.Content: I got what I paid for a cheap product that does not work.  I guess I should have known better.

Reviews.Title: Finally got one that works !!!
Reviews.Author: Bridget
Reviews.Content: I've had to return two preveious tablets from another manufactor from this site... And this one turned out to be a prefect purchase... I only purchased one to test out before I give my twins their own.... Like that the tablet come with no problems .... So hopefully I'll be able to get two more soon.... :)

Reviews.Title: no tiene manual
Reviews.Author: Gustavo MUÑOZ (guest to come)
Reviews.Content: no tiene manual y no tiene ninguna web para descargarlo. necesito saber hasta que tamaño de memoria puedo usar. Gracias.

Reviews.Title: Worst purchase
Reviews.Author: jaspersons@uwstout.edu
Reviews.Content: This item only worked for two weeks. Charging systems don't work. Return policy is non-existant. I'm stuck with a piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: will not stay charged more that 30 mins at a time, even if you charge it overnight!!! also, when you get an app from the app store, the device places all sorts of apps on here you dont even wont, and there is no way to factory reset!!

Reviews.Title: 7'' android
Reviews.Author: rosalinda giannini
Reviews.Content: received product, and it does not work properly. I can't get it to play any videos and the volume does not work. I wish I can return it, but it is to late to return. I'm not very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Michael Vanecko
Reviews.Content: We were locked out of the device and have not been able to get back in.  Not able to find anyone who can trouble shoot it for us.  Have contacted vendor and will be returning item.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: Got tablet for my six year old an it want keep an charge, but after that nothing can say wrong with the item for the price paid for it

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Leera Tripp
Reviews.Content: I had problems ever since I turned it on. Runs very slow, feels cheap, doesn't connect well to wifi, and is overall a horrible product.

Reviews.Title: chromo inc white 4gb 7" android 40 touch capacitive screen 1'2ghz
Reviews.Author: Brown Sugar
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this machine for her three children great for children they love this machine would recommend this machine

Reviews.Title: The seller resolved problem but did not like tablet
Reviews.Author: careprovider24
Reviews.Content: I didnt like this tablet at all. It kinda looked cheap to me. The pro of it was that it does have the real google play marketplace for apps. The seller resolved my problem and was very understanding.  The seller is a good seller, the product is just not the best tablet but it is okay.

Reviews.Title: worst tablet ever
Reviews.Author: christina
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these 2 have cracked screens already and the other just shuts off for no reason I'm very unhappy with these tablets.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: adriana
Reviews.Content: I don't have any problems, working fine I buy it for a friend and she love it, thinking on buy one for my husband

Reviews.Title: MADE POORLEY!!
Reviews.Author: Reviwer92
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item wanting something inexpensive and small. I thought thats what I was getting with this Tablet but unfortuntley when opened the box all my cords were used, and the tablet was "sweating". When i turned on the Tablet it was extremely slow I had to hit the smae thing over and over again. It has a terrible battery life, and the biggest thing mine would not charge at all!!! DO NOT BUY just spend $40 more and get a Kindle or something better. WASTE OF MONEY!!!

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: Dave Dork
Reviews.Content: Ordered the product and the first one did not work at all. Seller promptly replaced with a working one. Not too thrilled about the charging pin. It's tiny and off centered and worries me on the longevity. Not the easiest and sturdiest. As far as the overall operation is concerned, it works well for the cost. Purchased it for our son and he enjoys it. Biggest downfall seems to be battery life slim to none. Will spend more for better product in future.

Reviews.Title: J Williams
Reviews.Author: Joyce Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought the product for my grandson's birthday and only messed around with it a little while before giving it to him. It was beautiful product, appeared to be well made and performed well as I set time and date for him. I loved it because it was a great deal for the price and good piece of merchandise.

Reviews.Title: Very poor Chinese made tablet does not work, does not get charge battery does not last
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: Very poor performance very bad quality of picture . I will suggest dont buy this cheap. Its not only cheap its waste of money

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is great product.It was a very fast delivery.It meets my expectations. It was very true to the description. I am glad I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: Its jap-crap
Reviews.Author: Just Sum Dude
Reviews.Content: It does not function well, controls are placed very odd, and the buttons stick right out of the box. It is not worth the money, regardless of how much you pay.

Reviews.Title: 3g problem
Reviews.Author: Mastercard "shy but sneaky"
Reviews.Content: I just bought the tablet and so far its great.but i cant figure out how to get 3g any help?

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: RichsCougar
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new tablet on Jan 5. Approximately 1 month later my tablet arrived. I am very disappointed. The touch screen is covered in scratches. The WiFi barely works. I van be in a perfect area & only get a low signal strength. The Play Store App opened 1 time to download an app but won't open anymore. I want either a refund or an exchange.

Reviews.Title: Chromo tablet
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Ordered jan 5th received feb 4th the tablets so far seen to be good my daughters like them,the battery life isnt long, but seems to work pretty good,other than taking a month to get them they are happy!

Reviews.Title: Khila7
Reviews.Author: Judith49
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my God Daughter as a makeup Christmas gift. I had purchased another one which I ended up returning due to problems connecting to the internet or ability to get downloads. This was my first choice from Amazon but elected to purchase elsewhere. I should have went with my first choice. Needless to say, my God Daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: Poor product, good seller customer service
Reviews.Author: E. Erin Dowdy
Reviews.Content: We knew we weren't purchasing top of the line tablets when we bought two of these, but what we got was far less than we expected. The touch screens don't align correctly, the battery life was terrible and it was just in general an unresponsive product. Save and spend the money on a more expensive, higher quality tablet!I will say that Seller1on1 provided top notch return service, though, with full refunds, which we really appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: This is probably the worst tablet ever.  Yes it is cheap, well you don't even get what you pay for.  It doesn't hold a charge, when you try to tap an icon/app, you have to tap it several times for it to do anything.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Daryle S.
Reviews.Content: I got this product for twitter and to play my games it runs them very well i am happy with this tablet best one you can get for the money

Reviews.Title: very cheaply made
Reviews.Author: tadclgi
Reviews.Content: It looks very cheaply made and its screen quality is poor. Looks like a toy than a tablet. Camera equality is ok

Reviews.Title: dura muy poco la pila
Reviews.Author: harold jimenez
Reviews.Content: la pila dura menos de dos horas y para algunas aplicaciones es lenta, para juegos y demas es exelente.... la recomiendo para niños o adolecentes...

Reviews.Title: Small tablet
Reviews.Author: Tablet
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my teenager, so he can play games on, it's the write size to go anywhere with.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Although one of the accessories that came with the product was the incorrect one for the product, that issue was resolved immediately.  As far as the Chromo itself goes, I find this to be a fine little machine; and it fits my needs perfectly.  I am not highly "tech savvy", but this easy to use and to me seems quite remarkable for the price.  I have friends who have tablets, some of which were much more expensive than this one, but this one seems very comparable.  I recommend it.07-01-13 -  I am updating this review only because I have had this tablet for about 6 months; I still love it.  Some of the reviews say it looked childlike, was poorly constructed, etc.  They must not be reviewing the same tablet.  This tablet does everything I bought it for (expected); and then some.  Don't let poor reviews deter you.

Reviews.Title: On time service
Reviews.Content: Got 5 zee pad as a gift for Christmas and my nephews are loving it. I was contemplating if I should get it since its a week before Christmas. Emailed buyer and assured me it will arrive as estimated. True enough, I got all of them in time for Christmas. My nephews are so happy and they all jumped into playing their zee pad

Reviews.Title: It was very good and on time!!
Reviews.Author: Merilyn Perez
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend it this buyer was good make business with  you!! Great buyer and responsible. Very Good for real

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: MichaelShelton
Reviews.Content: I was really expecting more from the info i saw. It's extra slow, bad graphics, and i can't even get recording programs. Which is what i bought it for.

Reviews.Title: Chromo Inc White 4GB 7" Android 4.0 Touch Capacitive Screen
Reviews.Author: Taumaoe Atuatasi
Reviews.Content: Even though the first one was not received, it was replaced immediately.  I was highly satisfied with the product do to how easy it was to set up and the right size for my son.  He uses it as a tool for school and also to keep him busy when at home.  I would recommend this product to anyone who is not computer literate and also if you're looking for a low cost product.

Reviews.Title: White 4GB 7" Android 4.0 Touch Capactive Screen
Reviews.Author: Estella Taylor
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for our grandchildren.  This item was for our 13 year old grandson, he loved it and still does, even though his dad got him a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Not pleased
Reviews.Author: Kris wingfield
Reviews.Content: Its slow, the camera is horrible, the screen reminds me of a commador 64. Would not suggest this product for anyone

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: mcardoza73
Reviews.Content: A must say that my tablet came broken, but it was clear that was because of how the post office handled the box...I immediately communicated with cuatomer service and they are simply amazing....I just got back the tablet and its really nice...has the google play (altough some applications are not compatible) but overall really nice!! Cons: battery life not goot at all

Reviews.Title: perfecto
Reviews.Author: Rachie Poo
Reviews.Content: im really impressed with this ity bitty tablet:)its got all the android market apps from google play plus its small and light weight and easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: So far it has done everything I needed or wanted it to do!  I would recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable tablet.

Reviews.Title: Pretty darn good
Reviews.Author: J. Kneisl
Reviews.Content: It does everything that we thought it would do.  I purchased 2, as I have 2 children 7 & 9.  The OS works with every app, it's relatively quick, very sensitive touch.  We downloaded a couple of different readers and can get books from the library wirelessly.  The only reason it does not get 5 stars is the battery life.  Lucky to get an hour and a half with a full charge.  But that's okay considering that they can plug it into a car charger, usb port, or an outlet.  You Tube, Netflix all work well and the kids are finding new FREE apps everyday.  Thinking of getting one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price.
Reviews.Author: Joe Derose
Reviews.Content: I have all apple products. I am not comparing to them. Most of the cheap tablets in my local stores were about the same and over $99 which this was $79. I did not get a camera on back of it only on from was a little disappointing also the seller description said the Hard Drive Internal storage was to be 4GB when I got it was under 2GB which the total size was under 2GB. not just the available. I spoke with the seller and they said they thought it was 4GB they did not sound to convincing. However they did credit me $20 back which was very nice of them so at least they stand behind product. Not very sturdy its only plastic I recommend getting a case to hold it. But it does run android 4.0+ thats all I wanted for my mothers gift.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for kids!!!!
Reviews.Author: JessRdz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for a Christmas gift for my 5 year old daughter. She loves it!!! It doesn't freeze up and its easy to click or change screens. She really wanted a Ipad....which I was not going to spend that much. So now that she has the one, she thinks it a mini ipad. I'm thinking of buying another one for my son, since my daughter doesn't want to share hers.

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: L. Hield
Reviews.Content: did not use myself was a gift for nephew, he was very pleased with the item, light and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Evelyn
Reviews.Content: My grand daughter who is 11 wanted a tablet, this the one that she picked out, it came on time & she really enjoy's playing on it.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Oscar Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I wish it had two cameras but I guess it is what you can get for the price.The charger conector does not go all the way in so it may cause some damage either to the device or the conector did not like it much.In general good stuff.

Reviews.Title: Slow but will buy another .
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: This is my second one my daughter loves it she is 7years old. So I brought another one for my 20 year old he likes it but said it a little slow even with a memory card. However I do plan on buying another for my grandson. Because he is young he does not care about how slow it is.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: candace
Reviews.Content: First I want to say I ordered my item on dec 11 and it took a lil over a month for me to receive it...now that I have my tablet it won't charge unless I hold it in and hold it very still I'm returning it I'm so disappointed that I waited so long for it and it doesn't work properly

Reviews.Title: MY 3 YEAR OLD LOVES IT
Reviews.Author: ROCHELLE
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for my 3 year old son he love it and there alot to keep him busy while we on the  road however i dislike how fast it run off out power and from time to time it want start up but over all i like it and the price was good i feel i got what i paid for thinking about getting myself one

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool for the kids!
Reviews.Author: April G
Reviews.Content: For what I paid for it, it's pretty awesome. My 4 & 5 yr olds think they have an expensive iPad like they see on tv. Loaded with games it's great for long car rides. I'll be purchasing another soon!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
Reviews.Author: Nessa
Reviews.Content: If I could write this review without giving any stars I would! The tablet was awful! Difficult to use, apps kept closing on their own and kept kicking my mother out of any application she was in even if it was just Facebook. She brought the tablet to me to see if I could fix it because I'm very savvy with technology and this was a piece of crap. I ended up buying her an iPad which very obviously I should've done from the beginning. If you get anything from reading the reviews it's not to buy this under any circumstance unless you're buying it for somebody you hate. Biggest waste of money and biggest piece of s*** I have bought! Then to top it all off it's past the 30 day return date so now I'm stuck with a piece of s*** I don't want and can't use because it kicks me out of every application I open! So if you're down with throwing money in the garbage go ahead and buy it.

Reviews.Title: Tablet not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Countess
Reviews.Content: The charger does not fit correctly so it does not always charge. It is just really cheap. I bought it for my youngest child who is 7 and it won't let her log on the internet for certain things. You really do get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: order for a friend
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: great item for the price and customer service is very ocomadating.Order for a friend and he seems to love it.I think it works as well as my Ipad tablet

Reviews.Title: Died in 5 days!!!
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: After only 5 days the volume button got stuck! constantly going up and down on the screen then i turned it off to recharge it and let the tablet "rest" I go to turn it on the next morning and it wont turn on what so ever! I feel like I wasted my money...I got what I paid for I guess...

Reviews.Title: Battery is terrible
Reviews.Author: Shannon M
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9 year old daughter and she loves it. The touch screen works well without a stylus and it's works at a decent speed.However, after only an hour and a half of use the battery is completely dead. And this is just from using a few apps, nothing outrageous.We take a long drive a few times a month and it only makes it a quarter of the way before we need to plug it into the car charger and if it's being used while charging the battery power won't increase just maintain, so everytime you unplug it, it dies.It's a good tablet for the price but if you want one that you can use for a longer duration, I wouldn't recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Would you buy something you know you would regret?
Reviews.Author: Ryan, (Dhon)
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and disregarded them thinking this tablet would be perfect for what I would need it for. Well I WAS WRONG. This tablet blows. It was DOA, LATE, AND marked wrong by the seller.It does not have a 1.5ghz processor nor does it have 1gb of  ram.This product is just about the worst tablet you can buy, and if you cant afford a better one, stick to not owning one.

Reviews.Title: Poor choice
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Shipping was timely. But, the unit freezes up all the time, touch screen is unresponsive most of the time. Slow processing. Display is grainy.  I did not expect an I-Pad but I did expect the unit to at least work properly. Dissatisfied with over all performance even for the price I paid. Return Authorization was no problem. Lesson learned. I will spend a little more for a non generic brand.

Reviews.Title: Chrome Chite 4 gb 7 Android 4.0 Touch Capacitive Screen

Reviews.Content: I decided this was too much for my 4 year old granddaughterI should have kept it for myself, looked nice

Reviews.Title: Why I like this product

Reviews.Content: I really like the fact it is light weight...easy to work with...this is my first tablet and it's like having my personal computer wherever I go...

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Audrey
Reviews.Content: I love this product and it got here about on time! I would deffinatly reccommend this product to anyone who wants a tablet for any age i got one for my NANA too

Reviews.Title: Gift for my daughter - she loves it.
Reviews.Author: Colleen A. Kotars "C. Kotars"
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my daughter as a gift for Christmas, she does not have a laptop or desk top computer so this is prefect for her in her apartment! She loves it and loves the size & compact ability to bring it anywhere. Thanks - the only thing is that it arrived 2 days after Christmas. It said Priority Mail, but that took over 12 days.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Mart9532
Reviews.Content: This tablet is just ok. Maybe it's this particular tablet but it freezes a lot, downloads slowly, touch screen is not very sensitive. I'm glad I did not pay more for it but almost wish I had just spent more on an iPad mini

Reviews.Title: Didn't work & Terrible Customer Service
Reviews.Author: tnorris07
Reviews.Content: First it was to arrive in time for Christmas which it Didn't. When we did receive it cut on and as I was setting it up battery went dead. Well I plugged in charger that came with it and 12 hours later still wouldn't come on still a dead battery. So I go buy a wall charger, plug it in. Two days later still won't come back on. I contact seller and they are willing to exchange however I have to wait for a label they are sending me, then send this one back and once they receive then they will ship a replacement. Did not offer any discount or anything for the hassle it has created let alone the disappointment for gift receiver. So what was to be a Christmas gift won't actually be here until closer to Valentines Day. TERRIBLE!!!! Also I went back and read review it appears this has happened alot with this item and seller and they (Jason in customer service) tried to talk to me as if this was an isolated incident and it isn't. Seems to me they are not very Customer Friendly which makes for bad business.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: December
Reviews.Content: Good buy for the money.Really cool little device, my kids loved it!Apps and app store is great, lots of free apps and additional ones to purchase that are reasonable.

Reviews.Title: ok for price
Reviews.Author: j.m.74
Reviews.Content: Not really fast, kind of flimsy. But overall a good deal for the price. Good for kids to play with

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed in Amazon and Seller1ON1
Reviews.Author: Debra Tuttle
Reviews.Content: I ordered (3) of this product for my grandchildren for Christmas on 12/9/12. They received my money on 12/12/12 and promised I would receive by 12/17/12. Needless to say, I had the worst Christmas ever and had no gifts for the grandchildren. I received on 12/27/12. I sent two e-mails to Seller1ON1 before 12/20/12 and finally received a message back on 12/30/12. I was told by family and friends that shopping online using Amazon was the only way to do shopping and was a lot less stressful. I totally disagree and I am a very unhappy customer. The chargers that came with the Tablets don't even work. I requested on 1/5/13 that the company call me to discuss. I received a e-mail response back on 1/10/13 telling me to contact them.  They have not called me and have not give me a phone number to contact them. They provide the worst customer service I have ever had with a company. I would NEVER buy another thing from Seller1ON1 and am very hesitant if I will ever use Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Great Seller to purchase from...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 tablets for my children for Christmas. For the price the item is definately worth my money. Kids are 7 and 9 and have minimal difficulty with use. They wanted a Kindle Fire; however this item suits their needs. They are able to download games from Google and play for hours. One of the tablets malfunctioned after a few days, and the company replaced no questions asked, even before I returned the damaged item.

Reviews.Title: Disapointing tablet
Reviews.Author: Gene G
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my daughter. Very sorry to have waisted my time.It crashed as soon as it  was turned on.Then the seller wouldnt honor it.Thank U Amazon for your A to Z protection.

Reviews.Title: works great no issues
Reviews.Author: J33pguy74
Reviews.Content: works great no issues...only thing i had to do is set up a new google play account to get apps...it wouldnt accept my existing that i use with my phone

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Eric Christopher
Reviews.Content: Are these those most powerful tablets on the market ?noDo they have the best picture?nobut for this price these tablets are fantastic. I bought these for both my kids for christmas? Like every parent I was worried about buying a $400 tablet to put into my childs care. Both of my kids are fairly responsible for their age, but still. then I came across this tablet. these tablet has been great for everything my kids have thrown at it. the youngest is mostly games, but my oldest does email, netflix, hulu, youtube and a bunch of games and this powers through them all.so sure you can find more powerful better looking tablets out there, but if you are looking for a cheap, well built, tablet this one does it thing,oh one last thing battery lift I know that is everyones first concern, My son will crush this battery in about an hour to and hour and half. but that is straight play, no break, cut the rope marathons. then he plugs it in and about 2 hours later battery is fully charged and he is back at it. so for me with the amount of work he puts it through the battery does pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It made a good present to give to a little girl she loved it and it was chip it works good

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The product arrived a week after the projected date. It also only turned on the first day and hasn't since then. A huge waste of money.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: blackqueen
Reviews.Content: I brought it for my son he absolutely love it, he already downloaded a bunch of stuff on it. Am thinking about getting one for my self.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: LeyPez
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet in replace of the visual land tablet that I got for my niece. this tablet works perfect and she loves it.and it was suppose to come in mail by the third week of January but it came on the 5th.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: eniola  ajao
Reviews.Content: bought this as an addition for a new year gift and the person loves it also has the ability to expand capacity  by using an SM card

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It works good. The only issue is the battery doesn't last long on a charge. But i knew that when i bought them. I am very happy with them would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Bad news! DON'T BUY! DON'T BUY! DON'T BUY!
Reviews.Author: T. R. Boomer "Boomer"
Reviews.Content: Initially I was very happy with this product. The problem is it didn't last because the quality was so poor. After only two weeks of operation the USB port died. The vendor refused to do anything. They said I should perform a factory reset. They didn't tell me that I should back up my personal data first but I figured that out on my own. A factory reset will cause all personal data and settings to be lost. I backed it up through Google, and performed the reset. It did not fix the USB problem. The vendor still refused to issue an RMA number. I think Amazon will support me in this, but if not my credit card company certainly will.Here is what I thought originally thought when I received the unit:This unit has everything! It has WiFi, 3G, a camera, and it does everything! I even bought a keyboard for about $12.00 US, so that I can actually use it as a real computer. The best part is that the OS is Android 4.0 "Ice Cream Sandwich" (yum) which is sooo easy to use that anybody could use it!I paid only 74.99 for this dream machine, and I received free shipping because I signed up for Amazon Prime! The display is bright with high contrast and vivid color, so that I found the text very easy to read. I normally need reading glasses so this was a blessing. If you have a phone with the Android OS, this will be very easy for you to operate. This device can take advantage of Google Play Store that has many many apps for just about everything. I installed Angry Birds to test the video, sound, and touch screen. This little baby passed with flying colors! The sound was great, and the pictures were vivid. The touchscreen is so smooth and seamless that I found myself feeling guilty that I had stolen something. I did really, because this is such a great deal.Pros:-Very low cost-Very small footprint, and it easily will fit into any small purse or back pack-Very Fast Response-Extremely Easy to Use (Highly Intuitive)-Great Display with High Contrast, Vivid color, and sharp images (Easy to read)-Fast Response-Huge Market of FREE applications-Plays Movies-Plays games-Available Keyboards (to allow you to really type)-WiFi-3GCons:-Relatively small display compared to more expensive tablets-WiFi cannot connect to WEP, it can only connect o WEP-2 or WPA-2.-Relatively Small local storage space compared to a laptop or desktop computerThere is a strong possibility that I will buy a second unit because my wife likes it so much that she is insisting on having one too! It is so inexpensive, that I have no excuse for not buying one for her! I am very pleased with the high quality construction and feel of this little computer. Since I know how good it is, I won't take the chance of buying a similar unit that might not be as good.Great product!------------------Now however my advice is DON'T BUY! DON'T BUY! DON'T BUY! Beware! This is a POOR quality build and this unit will not last very long.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this Tablet
Reviews.Author: Bahman Seifollahi
Reviews.Content: It's not a tablet, it's a joke! Screen is awful, processor is very slow and it's made out very cheap plastic.

Reviews.Title: Perfectly suits our needs
Reviews.Author: Terri C.
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of the tablets for my kids for Christmas and we are very happy with them.  Obviously, they are not the best tablets on the market, but for the price and for their intended purposes (games for a 4 and 7 year old, Skype and general internet usage) they are perfect.I have friends who purchased the kid-marketed Meeps for twice the price and all of them have had problem after problem and some have returned their tablets.  Before ordering, we read all the reviews and were prepared to meet the occasional glitch, but thus far - with heavy daily use - we've been fully satisfied and are considering future purchases as gifts from other people.

Reviews.Title: This thing sucks
Reviews.Author: jess
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my son for Christmas thinking that it would be good for him (he is 6) to watch Netflix and play Angry Birds and other little games on. This thing takes for ever to load one of the games (5+ minutes) and ever since we got it, it has only held a charge for around 5-10 minutes before completely being dead and having to plug it back in. When we got it we charged it to full, tested out angry birds and 5 minutes later it was showing at about 15% battery we thought that maybe we just did not let it charge long enough and made a mistake that it was not really at full. Well after a few times of this happening we realized that even if you let the battery charge and it says totally full as soon as you take it off the charger it will die really fast. It is ok for Netflix for our son but a pain if he has to sit right next to an outlet the whole time (the cord is really short.) We bought an extension cord so at least he can relax on the couch to play his game or use Netflix but he does not like playing the games because they take so long to load. I would say don't buy this and go with a better known brand for sure. We learned from our mistake.

Reviews.Title: Nice buy
Reviews.Author: Arrie
Reviews.Content: Good buy, was a gift for my 10 year old niece and she loves it.  Did not come with any games but was able to download.

Reviews.Title: great product at this price point
Reviews.Author: brinkley_ann
Reviews.Content: con: camera does not take great pictures at all but bought for a kid who still has fun taking pictures and at this price, i really have no complaints so far

Reviews.Title: white zeepad
Reviews.Author: illnana34
Reviews.Content: Works great love the cool white color of it. Everything works fine, no issues. i would purchase from here again. Thanx...!!!!

Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a gift for my 11 year old son. He has wanted a tablet for some time now and I wasn't about to spend hundreds of dollars on one that could potentially break easily, so I decided to give this one a try. I received the item within 2 weeks of ordering and the package was in good shape when it arrived.However, having this tablet less that 24 hours already we have had issues with it. The battery does not stay charged for very long, the screen has frozen repeatedly and it has asked that the tablet be reset. If I am having these type of problems right away who knows what could happen later on down the line.  I am going to return this product.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY

Guys this thing is a peice of crap it should b illegal for them to do this to their buyers... Reviews.Title: Everything is relative
Reviews.Author: wc2013
Reviews.Content: This tablet will never outshine an iPad and will never come close to any Samsung product. But it's also 1/5th the price of an iPad mini and can do 80% of the tasks that an iPad can. If you're looking for a tablet that can read email, play a few games and listen to music, then why pay $325 when you can pay $60? On the other hand, if you're looking for high quality graphics both in video and in games, then stay away from this tablet. Relative to its price, you can't go wrong; but never expect this to compete with a high end tablet. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Still under review

Reviews.Content: We bought this tablet for our 7 year old daughter who loves to play games on my iphone. When she first got her tablet, she played with it constantly for about a week until we couldn't get it to turn on anymore. After letting it charge all day and night a second time and manipulating the power on button, we finally got it to turn on again. We were really close to sending to back. Hopefully this will not be an ongoing issue because she does love it and it works well for what she uses it for.

Reviews.Title: chromo no
Reviews.Author: Angela Lane Mastin
Reviews.Content: This product sucks to be nice the battery life is only about two hours the camra front face is not good but U get what U pay for.The tablet came nicely packed with a small instruction manual ok but as soon as I downloaded the yahoo app things got strange it would not pull up my email after about ten days and there were emails being sent to everyone in my adress book from only God knows where it wouldnt allow me to close out my email for about thirty minutes then it closed I had no idea someone was coping my information but they were if U get this tablet beware I have had it tooooo long to send it back so I will just use it for games cause watching tv on it the screen is constantly adjusting......Not a good product not even for the money.........

Reviews.Title: Awful Customer Service
Reviews.Author: S Merrell
Reviews.Content: I would not advise ANYONE to order from this company!  This order was a gift for my daughter and when we got it she was so excited but the thing did not work.  SO we sent it back, they sent a replacement that one did not work.  SO we sent it back AGAIN and guess what?  They are now giving me the runaround about send us a replacement!!!!  I should have just asked for my money back and most people would have but my daughter really wanted this one.  Please folks don't even bother with this company unless you just like having to go through changes!

Reviews.Title: Bought 8 of these. After 2 months every one of them has stopped working.
Reviews.Author: Jason C. Holloway "J Holloway"

I had to do factory resets on all of them three times just to keep them working, and now none of them will turn on.  Talk about a ruined Christmas for my children. Don't waste your money. Spend more and get something that will actually work.

Reviews.Title: OK For My purpose
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet specifically to use as a Kiosk (always open to specific app) so I don't need a high performance tablet. For my purposes this tablet seems OK. Couple of things though:- The screen has a weird LCD look to it at many angles- The screen does not always display "square" so circles will look like ovals. I have never seen this on my other android devices.- Also some applications display beyond the edge of the screen and are cut off slightly- Tablet does not respond to the normal "home page management" controls for android (still not sure how to add or remove pages with this device).I think for some users many of the above things would be a deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: diego
Reviews.Content: This product has a great price-value, however, I have to note that the technical specifications are not displayed by the product description.The processor in the title reads "1.2 ghz" and actually is 1ghz, 3g is not supported, although it does have wifi. for me it is still confusing to see that the hard drive of the tablet has two units 1 and 2 gb, which reach 4 gb mentioned product description. The RAM itself is correct, but inside the box was not micro usb cable, thank God I had one of my phone so I could connect to the pc. I compared it with other similar models and has good performance despite its low cost.
